title: Kandji - Overview
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of all logs.

definition.content:
[Kandji](https://www.kandji.io/) is an Apple device management and security platform that helps organizations automate deployment, enforce compliance, and secure macOS and iOS devices.

This dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of all logs.

For more information, see the [Kandji Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/kandji/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates **Kandji** Events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
